skillDetails.name: Primal Hex
skillDetails.description: Aura: Every damaging hit, heal and shield by Nature and Mage Monsters in the party has a 4% chance to apply a random Debuff on an enemy.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: Every damaging hit, heal and shield by Nature and Mage Monsters in the party has a 4% chance to apply a random Debuff on an enemy.
